title: Council Directive of 18 July 1988 amending Directive 75/275/EEC concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (Netherlands)
header:
COUNCIL  DIRECTIVE
of 18 July 1988
amending Directive 75/275/EEC concerning the Community list of less-favoured farming areas within the meaning of Directive 75/268/EEC (Netherlands)
(88/403/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Directive 75/275/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex attached hereto.
This Directive is addressed to the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 July 1988.
For the Council
The President
Y. POTTAKIS
(1) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No C 109, 26. 4. 1988, p. 7.
(4) Opinion delivered on 17 June 1988 (not yet published in the Official Journal).
(5) OJ No L 128, 19. 5. 1975, p. 229.
(6) OJ No L 252, 3. 9. 1987, p. 21.
ANNEX
LESS-FAVOURED AREAS WITHIN THE MEANING OF ARTICLE 3 (5) OF DIRECTIVE 75/268/EEC
